document.full_text: the trustee in charge of liquidating what's left of lehman brothers holdings inc's  u.s. brokerage told a judge on monday that barclays plc  should return $2.1 billion it received when it bought lehman's north american arm.
document.title: lehman, barclays fight over rescue terms
lines_and_colors: the trustee in charge of liquidating what's left of lehman brothers holdings inc's  u.s. brokerage told a judge on monday that barclays plc  should return $2.1 billion it received when it bought lehman's north american arm.
